com.smartsheet.api.models

Class Discussion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartsheet.api.models.IdentifiableModel<Long>
      • com.smartsheet.api.models.Discussion

  • public class Discussion
extends IdentifiableModel<Long>
    Represents the Discussion object.
    See Also:
    Help Using Discussions

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Discussion.CreateDiscussionBuilder
      A convenience class to help generate discussion object with the appropriate fields for adding a discussion to a sheet.
